I'm triyng to find out how to move the markers with the map when i'm moving the map. Hi!

Thank you!

nothing is impossible... maybe you just don't know how to do it :P

Hi!

It happens that radioman was right. I forgot to add the overlay to the map. I mean; I create the overlay instance but I didn't add it to the map. I was confused because I've found Gmap.UpdateMarkerLocalPosition and UpdateMarkerLocalPosition and, using those, the markers and polygons were displayed on the map. I realize I was missing to add the overlay when I was looking why onmouseover tooltips were not working.

Thanks radioman and xandolph.

 

Regards!
